reviewText: Love it great movie mostly if you are into that kind of thing. One of my most loved movies so intresting.
I always liked the craft and that was the main reason why I ordered this. I liked wild things too as there were a few surprises in it that I didn't expect. very satisfied with my purchase.
I had boughten the craft on vhs along time ago and planned to replace it with dvd, and finally did it.
When I bought this I was only buying for "The Craft" But the second movie was great as well. This set is great I am glad I bought this
everything seems to be in order with the movies..:)id definately buy from this seller again in the future if i had extra money to spend online..:)

This is a great one, i bought it mostly for THE CRAFT but it ended up been a great buy!!!
I'm a big fan of The Craft and Neve Campbell's movies as well.
I'd never had the chance to see Wild Things before despite the hype when it first came out.
I would recommend both of these movies even if you can't get this double feature (which I highly recommend), you can always get them separately.
It was a big surprise for me especially with Wild Things because I found out that it was filmed in Miami, where i currently live :-)))
